name: (Annual) World 2 Warm-Up
description: If you never walk, you'll never see all the scenery.
requirement: Play Zone 1, Zone 2, and Zone 3 in World 2 in Exploration Mode.

bits.text: Complete World 2, Zone 1 in Exploration Mode.
Complete World 2, Zone 2 in Exploration Mode.
Complete World 2, Zone 3 in Exploration Mode.
